Question & Options:
In the 2005 movie 'The Fog', how do Nick Castle and Elizabeth Williams reconnect?
Options:
A. They run into each other at a party.
B. Nick Castle meets Elizabeth Williams, his former girlfriend, who has returned after six months.
C. They are both investigating a mystery together.
D. Elizabeth Williams is Nick Castle's new neighbor.
Correct Answer: Nick Castle meets Elizabeth Williams, his former girlfriend, who has returned after six months.
